snippet: The choreographer Ishmael Houston-Jones has organized a new, bigger version of Parallels, his 1982 Danspace Project work that asked, what is black dance?
abstract: Choreographer Ishmael Houston-Jones curates the latest edition of the dance festival Parallels, which he created in 1982 for Danspace Project.
lead_paragraph: The choreographer Ishmael Houston-Jones has organized a new, bigger version of Parallels, his 1982 Danspace Project work that asked, what is black dance?

headline.seo: Ishmael Houston-Jones Brings a New Parallels to Danspace
headline.main: Ready to Upend Dance Expectations Again
headline.print_headline: Ready to Upend Dance Expectations Again
